page.title: 03Shopping Services W.of Chard
page.content: There is no shop of any kind in the block.The last, a small general store on the outskirts of Chard,closed in June 1985. Chard itself provides a shopping centre with three medium sized super_markets and several mini markets and a wide variety of specialist retailers and it is to this centre that most of the block population go to shop. Some of the residents of{Whitestaunton and{Wadeford}support the three general stores and Post Office in{Combe St. {Nicholas}.For department stores there is a journey of 16 miles to{Taunton,} where such super_stores as Sainsburys,Debenhams,British Home Stores and Asda are located.A free bus runs from Chard to the latter store twice a week.
